messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Melodic Mansion Mystery DATE: 02/02/63 The courtroom was filled with a tangible tension as the trial unfolded. The prosecution brought forth the officers pivotal to the investigation to recount their experiences. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Adams, the lead investigator of this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Adams. Can you outline the events on the night the mystery emerged? WITNESS: Certainly. On the night of August 8th, Officer C. D. Baker observed unusual activity in Melodic Mansion and reported it. The investigation was initiated promptly. PROSECUTOR: Who managed the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Clark and Technician G. H. Davis were tasked with the forensic examination. PROSECUTOR: Who led the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Evans and K. L. Ford were in charge of interrogating suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense launched a cross-examination of Captain Adams concerning the investigative approach. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Green, O. P. Hill, and Q. R. Isaac were also summoned to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
